lines.text:
[shows Anna and Danny his cars]
How do you like my vehicles? Maybe we can take them for a spin one day.

[referring to old man Herman]
He wants to go with us!
Can he come?
Not alone. He needs someone else to make the light.
Do you have a pool?
Yes. Yes, I do.
Why don't you invite us over for a swim?
Xander.
He says he love kids.
I think that's a great idea! How 'bout a picnic on Sunday, huh?

[checks in the room where Anna was locked in and realizes that she is not there]
Oh, brother!

[continues to have fun playing with the kids]
Whoa! Yeah! Here ya go, here ya go!

[as he approaches Mr. Bolt]
Somehow, Anna got out.

[shocked]
What?
I didn't do anything, honest.
Alright, get to the stables. I'll take care of this guy.
[Mr. Bolt and Luther are in the living room testing Anna's powers]
This is a latin cylinder. Can you make it fly?
No.

Well, Danny has shared everything. We've gotten to be good friends of yours. I won't tell anyone your secret. We tell it's kinetic powers like any other muscle, you gotta exercise it into lithography. I'm just trying to help you guys. Uh, open it up.
[Luther takes the lid off the latin cylinder]
Now, can you make those rocks fly into the tube?
This won't work.
Why don't you trust me? I mean it hurts my feelings. I open my house here, I open my heart. Instead, you act like we were strangers. What is it you don't like about me?
It's not that. I just can't do it.
Why not?
We're too far away.
Well, let's move closer. There! Alright.
I'm losing my patience, young lady. Now try to move those rocks!
What's this about, anyway?
It's too complicated for you to understand, just do what I'm telling ya!
I can't.
I can get mean if I have to be, but nobody wants anything bad to happen, do they?...
[Anna is not answering him]
...you love your brother?

[yells at Mr. Bolt]
I'm not gonna help you! I hate you and I hate being here.

[yells back at Anna]
Listen, you little witch! I don't care what you think about me, but nobody here says no to me, ya hear?
[Mr. Bolt meets Danny at the stable area]
Wanna go for a spin, Danny? You can drive.
Me?
Have you driven a car?
No.
All the way to the house if you like.

[thinking]
Let in the light, brother. I don't want to lose you again.
Huh?
[Mr. Bolt grabs Danny to the car]
Get in the car, you little brat!
Ohhh... let go! Let go!
Just shut up!
[after Mr. Bolt gets covered in black paint]
Your Sheriff and Luther told me everything, Mr. Bolt. You had those kids under lock and key. You planned to exploid their power.
Woman's talking nonsense.
[Xander walks up the hill]
Xander!
I'm going up there!
Wait. I'm coming with you.
I'm very, very disappointed in you, Mr. Bolt.
You ungrateful little turncoat... you're fired!
Too late. I quit a half an hour a go. I'm gonna go where I belong.
Come on in here.
[the other Sheriff approaches Bronson]

[referring to Mr. Bolt]
Put the cuffs on this guy.
[Bronson walks up the same hill Xander and Brown took and the other sherrif sends Mr. Bolt to the police car]
OK Mr. Bolt, in the back. Watch your head.
